title: Is this your gateway drug? - NZXT Function Keyboard
description: Thanks to NZXT for sponsoring today's video! Get your NZXT Function Keyboard and Lift Mouse today at:   NZXT has entered the configurable mechanical keyboard market with the FUNCTION keyboard, also they threw in their corded mouse LIFT! They're not here to take over or "ruin" the market, but another option for you to start your keebs journey.   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.   GET MERCH:   AFFILIATES, SPONSORS & REFERRALS:   PODCAST GEAR:   SUPPORT US ON FLOATPLANE:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS ---------------------------------------------------  0:00 - They sent us too much STUFF 0:10 - Function keyboard unboxing 0:37 - Function keyboard weight and exterior impressions 1:00 - Function keyboard overview 1:43 - Customize your own Function keyboard  2:15 - In-depth look at the Function keyboard 2:40 - Media controls 2:51 - RGB impressions 2:58 - Typing impressions 3:10 - Keyswitches 4:00 - Other Function keyboard forms 4:54 - Pricing impressions 5:06 - NZXT Lift Mouse impressions 5:58 - MORE boxes! 6:05 - USB cord colors 6:24 - NZXT CAM software impressions 6:55 - Other media control buttons 7:41 - More RGB options 8:22 - Macro function 8:45 - Configuring NZXT Lift Mouse 9:41 - Outro
